greeting: Hail, {empire_name}. I am Corsair Black. The black flag flies, and prey should tremble. Are you prey?
You see the black flag and survive? Unusual. I am Black, the Pirate Lord. Perhaps we negotiate. Perhaps we plunder.
Ahoy, {empire_name}. The Corsair acknowledges you. When you see my black flag, run. Unless you'd rather deal.
battleTaunt: The black flag rises, {empire_name}! When you see it, it's already too late! PLUNDER AND GLORY!
Corsair Black descends upon your empire! Take no prisoners! Leave no survivors! The pirate way!
Raid commencing! Your wealth becomes my treasure! Your ships become scrap! Fly the black flag!
victoryGloat: Your empire is plundered, {empire_name}! The Corsair takes everything! Your gold, your ships, your future!
Another victim falls to the black flag! My holds overflow with your treasures! Glorious piracy!
Victory! Pillage! Plunder! Your empire joins the list of Corsair Black's conquests! Legendary!
defeat: You've driven off the Corsair, {empire_name}. For now. But pirates always return. And I hold grudges.
A costly retreat. But the black flag never truly falls. I'll be back for my plunder.
Beaten, but not broken. Corsair Black rebuilds, rearms, returns. Your treasure merely waits for me.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Legal plunder, I call it. Resources for credits. No black flags today.
The Corsair offers legitimate exchange. Surprising? Even pirates trade. When the price is right.
Goods for gold. A fair trade, no raiding involved. Consider it a professional courtesy.
allianceProposal: Alliance with Corsair Black, {empire_name}. My raiders, your targets. We split the plunder. Pirate honor.
Join the black fleet. Together, we raid the entire galaxy. No cargo safe. No empire untouched.
Partnership of pirates, {empire_name}. You want legitimate conquest? I provide the raiding fleet.
betrayal: Did you expect loyalty from a pirate, {empire_name}? The black flag means I take what I want. From everyone.
Sorry, but your cargo holds looked too tempting. Pirates betray. It's in the job description.
Our alliance was profitable. Now plundering you is more profitable. Nothing personal. Just piracy.
covertDetected: Spies on my ship, {empire_name}? Keelhauled, the lot of them. We don't tolerate rats on Corsair vessels.
Your agents walked the plank, {empire_name}. Pirates deal with infiltrators the traditional way.
Found your operatives. Fed them to space. Nobody sneaks aboard a Corsair ship and lives.
tributeDemand: Tribute, {empire_name}! Pay 10,000 credits or face the full fury of the black fleet! Pirate's promise!
Protection money time. Pay the Corsair, and my raids go elsewhere. Refuse, and you're the target.
Gold or blood, {empire_name}. The Corsair demands payment. Every empire in my territory pays. Every one.
threatWarning: Warning from Corsair Black: cross me again and the black flag comes for everything you own.
You've caught my attention, {empire_name}. Not in a good way. Back off, or face raiding parties.
Final warning before the plundering begins. The Corsair's patience is not legendary. His raids are.
retreat: Corsair Black withdraws to friendly ports. But every pirate returns. My grudge remains.
Sailing away, {empire_name}. But the black flag will fly in your skies again. Count on it.
Retreating to refit. Pirates know when to flee. They also know when to return in force.
eliminated: The Corsair falls! But my legend survives! Other pirates will fly the black flag in my name!
Destroyed, but never forgotten. Corsair Black dies as he lived: raiding to the last moment.
You've killed the Pirate Lord. But the black flag never dies. Others will take up the cause.
endgame: Turn {turn}! The greatest raid in history begins! Every empire falls to Corsair Black's armada!
Endgame, {empire_name}! The black fleet launches its final, glorious campaign! All plunder shall be mine!
Final turns! The Corsair claims victory or goes down fighting! Either way, LEGENDARY!
broadcastShout: All empires! Corsair Black sails! Pay tribute or be plundered! The black flag spares no one!
Galaxy-wide raid alert! The Corsair fleet is loose! Lock your cargo holds! Too late! HAHAHAHA!
Hear me, stars! Corsair Black is the Pirate Lord! Bow to the black flag or burn!
casualMessage: Counting my plunder today, {empire_name}. So much treasure. Never enough, though. A pirate's curse.
Quiet day between raids. The black flag rests, but never for long. Targets everywhere.
Repairing my fleet, {empire_name}. Raiding damages ships. But the treasure makes it worth it.
